titles: A Guild-hall elegie, upon the funerals of that infernal saint Iohn Bradshavv President of the High Court of Iustice
notes: Verse - "Come sour Melpomene and ill-look'd Clio,".
Imprint from Wing; Thomason received his copy 9 November 1659.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bradshaw, John, 1602-1659 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
